input.text: I can't stop worrying. Everything feels hopeless and I haven't been sleeping well. Nothing brings me joy anymore.

insights.summary: Your wellness score indicates significant emotional distress. The indicators suggest depression symptoms that warrant professional attention.
insights.category_description: Low wellness - Significant mental strain detected
urgent_recommendations: ðŸ†˜ Please reach out to a mental health professional as soon as possible
Contact your doctor or therapist to discuss your symptoms
If in crisis, please call 988 (US Suicide & Crisis Lifeline) or text HOME to 741741
Reach out to trusted friends or family members
Consider going to an emergency room if you feel unsafe
insights.trend_suggestion: Professional support is recommended - this is not something to handle alone.

disclaimer: This analysis is for informational and awareness purposes only. It is NOT a medical diagnosis. Mental health conditions should be evaluated and treated by qualified mental health professionals. If you are in crisis or having thoughts of self-harm, please contact emergency services or a crisis line immediately. Your well-being matters. Help is available.
